messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Asthma and Stress
messages.msgSnippet: As I understand it, stress is an aggravates them but doesn t cause them. The underlying cause must be there. Lynda ... From: Bridget E Coffman
messages.messageBody:
As I understand it, stress is an aggravates them but doesn't cause them.
The underlying cause must be there.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: Bridget E Coffman <rumpleteasermom@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 14, 2001 12:13 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Asthma and Stress


> Well, I do think stress can play a part in asthma. I've had attacks that
> were partly stress related. BUT, I've never had an attack that was
> entirely due to stress. I have however, had attacks that were entirely
> due to allergens in my environment.
>
> Bridget
>
> > Date: Wed, 14 Nov 2001 12:12:20 EST
> > From: SandraDodd@...
> > Subject: asthma and stress
> >
> > -=-My son has both eczema and asthma. I've never heard anyone claim
> >
> > > that there are emotional factors involved with them. -=-
> >
> > It's worth checking it out.
> >
> > If you go to google.com and enter asthma and stress you'll get
> > several
> > current studies--Helsinki, Australia, Scotland, U.S. (National
> > Jewish-Med
> > Sci). Two excerpts and then a comment:
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
> In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it
> goes on.
> - Robert Frost

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Asthma and Stress
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I do think stress can play a part in asthma.  I ve had attacks that were partly stress related.  BUT, I ve never had an attack that was entirely due to
messages.messageBody:
Well, I do think stress can play a part in asthma. I've had attacks that
were partly stress related. BUT, I've never had an attack that was
entirely due to stress. I have however, had attacks that were entirely
due to allergens in my environment.

Bridget

> Date: Wed, 14 Nov 2001 12:12:20 EST
> From: SandraDodd@...
> Subject: asthma and stress
>
> -=-My son has both eczema and asthma. I've never heard anyone claim
>
> > that there are emotional factors involved with them. -=-
>
> It's worth checking it out.
>
> If you go to google.com and enter asthma and stress you'll get
> several
> current studies--Helsinki, Australia, Scotland, U.S. (National
> Jewish-Med
> Sci). Two excerpts and then a comment:

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it
goes on.
- Robert Frost
